p: This study was approved by the University of Malaya animal ethics committee [OS/05/07/2006/TKZ/A(R) and OS/02/06/2008/TKZ(a)(R)]. Primary ACs and bone marrow MSCs were collected separately from three male New Zealand white rabbits (age: 3 months old; weight: 2.0 Â± 0.5 kg). Animals were sacrificed by overdosing animals with CO 2 gas prior to sample harvesting.
